alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 01 at 9:51AM PDT until November 02 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...First Significant Storm of the Wet Season Moving in Later Today... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 6000 feet. Snow level lowering to 5000 feet Tuesday night with 3 to 6 inches of snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley, Upper San Joaquin River and Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge. * WHEN...From 1 PM Today to 11 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with high country road closures. The hazardous conditions could impact hikers and campers in the National Parks.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
